Meet TaskDone

Taskdone is a software development manager created by João Gabriel Onofre to showcase his skills in creating fluid and easy to use applications. The project is built using React, NodeJS, Express and MongoDB. CSS3 SASS was used for a unique theme. The purpose of the app is to produce a kanban flow of tasks for a software team. It facilitate the management of a software creation environment, the integration of teams and delegation of functions and roles.

A user can create a profile and select if he is a software developer or a project manager, each of those categories will have some specific access inside the application. After registered, the user can enter in a project (or create one, if he is a project manager). In it, tasks will be delegated for the user (or the user will create new tasks to delegate, if he is a project manager).

Want to give it a try?

Register a new profile and try some of the resources provided in the app. If you already have an account, you can sign in. You can also demo the app with a pre-build profile, check it here
